law.text: Any person violating KRS 258.500(2), (3), (4), (5), (6), (11), or (12) shall be punished by a fine of not less than two hundred and fifty dollars ($250), nor more than one thousand dollars ($1,000), or by imprisonment in the county jail for not less than ten (10) nor more than thirty (30) days, or both. No person shall be charged with a violation of KRS 258.500(2), (3), (4), (5), (6), (11), or (12) if the requirements of KRS 258.500(7) are not met.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 2, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 94, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 5.
